title: He's Old Enough To Know Better
itunes:title: He's Old Enough To Know Better
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married over 20 years and thought everything was going well in my marriage. My husband and I are in our late 50s and our children are finally grown so we have more time to focus on each other. We are getting along well and our sex life is the best it has been in years. The other day I checked my husband's email to follow up on jobs he is applying for. He knows I have access to his email. A couple of weeks ago he went to get a complete physical and I noticed an email from his doctor, with lab results...........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married over 20 years and thought everything was going well in my marriage. My husband and I are in our late 50s and our children are finally grown so we have more time to focus on each other. We are getting along well and our sex life is the best it has been in years. The other day I checked my husband's email to follow up on jobs he is applying for. He knows I have access to his email. A couple of weeks ago he went to get a complete physical and I noticed an email from his doctor, with lab results...........
